textBox.richText: In true Nick Pappagiorgio style we’ve made it to the MGM Grand. And may I say what a fine establishment it is. After all the complications we have been accommodated nicely including an extremely late check out tomorrow evening which helps us with our 11pm flight to NYC. To celebrate a certain ceremony that took place this morning we spent the day by the pool sipping Pina Coladas and Strawberry Daiquiris. It’s a tough life...
